metadata.name: Year of the Tiger
metadata.description:
2022 is a year of the Water-Tiger. The Tiger is known as the king of all beasts in some places. But in this place theyâ€™re kind, they live in peace.
   The zodiac sign Tiger is a symbol of exorcising evils, strength, and braveness. 
   These tigers will drive away evil and will bring good fortune and good luck to those who hold this NFT.
